issue.title: [Java] Support comparison for unsigned integers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6580](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6580). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In this issue, we support the comparison of unsigned integer vectors, including UInt1Vector, UInt2Vector, UInt4Vector, and UInt8Vector.
With support for comparison for these vectors, the sort for them is also supported automatically.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6580?focusedCommentId=16944401) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5405
